info.summary:
Arie Shoshani works as a senior staff scientist in NERSC (National Energy Research Scientific Computing) Division at Lawrence Berkeley Laboratory in Berkeley, and his\her h-index is 44, g-index is 79. His\Her interests are :
 Data Analysis; Data Management; Bitmap Index; Indexation; Data Structure;
